Package edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.user

Class Faculty

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.user.User
edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.user.Faculty
public class Faculty extends User
The Faculty class represents an individual faculty record.
Author:
Dania Swelam

  • Constructor Details

    • Faculty

      public Faculty(String firstName, String lastName, String id, String email, String password, int maxCourses)
      Constructor for constructing a Faculty object consisting of first name, last name, faculty ID, email, hashed password, and maximum number of courses.
      Parameters:
      firstName - the first name of the faculty member
      lastName - the last name of the faculty member
      id - the faculty's Unity ID
      email - the email address of the faculty member
      password - the hashed password of the faculty member
      maxCourses - the maximum number of courses the faculty can teach per semester

  • Method Details

    • getMaxCourses

      public int getMaxCourses()
      Retrieves the maximum number of courses the faculty can have per semester.
      Returns:
      the maximum number of courses the faculty can have per semester.

    • setMaxCourses

      public void setMaxCourses(int maxCourses)
      Sets the maximum number of courses the faculty member can enroll in.
      Parameters:
      maxCourses - the maximum number of courses to set
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the maximum courses are less than the minimum allowed courses or exceed the maximum allowed courses

      Returns the faculty's schedule.

      Returns:
      true if the faculty is overloaded, false otherwise
